name: peninsular
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
consisting of or relating to a peninsula (= a long piece of land that sticks out from a larger area of land into the sea or into a lake): Conditions on peninsular coastal areas can be very different from the interior's higher ground and valleys. Donegal's northerly position and its peninsular shape means the county is still perceived as inaccessible.
More examplesFewer examplesI was going to hike round the peninsular coastal path. Terengganu is a state in NE Peninsular Malaysia.Taking advantage of my knowledge of the peninsular coast, I tried to reach a lesser known port.
